title: Wrong data set result returned when an invalid filter expression 'row[0]' is set
description: When the filter 'row[0] equals to 0' is set, the result set returned is incorrect or null.
OB: The first result record is returned when previewing the data set with the filter 'row[0] equals to'.
EB: The expected behavior is that the developer mentioned that 'row[0]' can only be generated after all the data has been fetched. 'row[0]' cannot be used as a filter expression.
SR:
1. Set a filter in the data set with the expression 'row[0] equals to'.
2. Click on the Preview tab.

Result: The first result record is returned when previewing the data set.

Expected Result: As the developer mentioned, 'row[0]' can only be generated after all the data has been fetched. 'row[0]' cannot be used as a filter expression.
